name: Setup Claude Opus 4.6 on OpenClaw
trigger: User wants to use Claude Opus 4.6
steps: Configure Anthropic API key: claude setup-token
Add 'models' section with 'anthropic' provider and 'claude-opus-4-6' configuration (reasoning: true, contextWindow: 1000000, maxTokens: 128000)
Add 'agents' section with default model set to 'anthropic/claude-opus-4-6'
